 CORE COMPETENCIES  
 
Managing complex research projects  (ideation,  prioritization,  execution ), translating vision 
from business into research solutions , intellectual property  drafting , pilot plant construction 
and operation  (eg., reactors up to 4 gallons, 120 barg , and 7.5 m distillation columns) . 
 
Managing and training laboratory technician s in air-sensitive techniques, high -throughput 
techniques, pressure reactors, vac uum distillations, handling highly c orrosive and explosive 
mixtures, reporting out data, and SHE trainings for nobody gets  hurt policy.  
 
Expertise in data a cquisition and interpretation of  homogeneous and heterogeneous catalyst 
characterization ( X-ray diffraction, NMR, FT -IR, BET, SEM, TEM, etc), and catalytic process 
development and optimization (online GC, HPLC,  NMR,  etc). 
 
Inventor  on eight patent application s and author of ei ght peer -reviewed publications. Over twenty 
three international conference presentations . 
 
Languages:  Bilingual in English and Spanish .
